name: getRooms
shortDescription: Returns all information about all rooms
description: This method returns all room IDs, one or all translations and the room metadata.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: A lower case ISO 639-1 language and upper case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code seperated by a dash.

returnValue: Returns an Array<Struct> with all rooms on success. When languageCode is specified each Array element is a Struct with three entries: The ID of type Integer, NAME of type String and METADATA of type Struct. If the specified translation is unknown an empty String is returned for NAME. When languageCode is not specified each Array element is also a Struct with three entries: The ID of type Integer, TRANSLATIONS of type Struct with the language code as key and the name as value and METADATA of type Struct.
